text: Takuya Hirai is a Japanese politician of the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP. He has been a member of the House of Representatives since 2000. He was the 1st Minister for Digital Transformation from September 2021 to October 2021. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Digital Transformation ministers of Japan
title: Takuya Hirai
